name: Peppermill Terrace Lounge
description: With craft cocktails and gorgeous views of the pools and gardens, Terrace Lounge is the place for an upscale, intimate experience set in a rotunda with a grand chandelier. Award-winning wines, seasonal drinks made with locally-sourced ingredients, and exclusive whiskies rarely available to the public — paired with small plates from Biscotti's. The perfect escape for a sophisticated night on the town.
shortDescription: Upscale rotunda bar at Peppermill with pool views, award-winning wines, and rare whiskies.

faqs.question: What makes Terrace Lounge unique?
faqs.answer: Set in a rotunda with stunning pool and garden views, it features rare whiskies, award-winning wines, and locally-sourced cocktails.

faqs.question: Is Terrace Lounge good for golf groups?
faqs.answer: Perfect for a sophisticated pre-dinner gathering or post-round drinks — intimate atmosphere with excellent wine and spirits.

testimonials.quote: The Terrace Lounge is Peppermill's hidden gem. Views of the pools, rare whiskies, and craft cocktails. Our group had an incredible time.
testimonials.author: Robert A.

testimonials.quote: Best bar at Peppermill — the rotunda setting with pool views is stunning. Had a rare Scotch and small plates. GTHS always recommends the right spots.
testimonials.author: Peter M.
